text: @JohnCornyn @DailyCaller But it is true, #ComradeCornyn. The #GOP is entirely composed of #GOPCowards who only believe in greed (Tax cuts to the filthy rich), racism (look at the flags at #TraitorTrump rallies) and the rejection of science (full onslaught of the #COVID19 plague). Accept who you are.
